text_block_list.text: —— This is Tracen Academy.

Many promising young horsegirls 
gather here, dreaming of running 
in the prestigious Twinkle Series…

They spend their days studying together, 
training their bodies and minds…
…Yet, one day ——

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Emergency!!!!!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text: This cannot go oooon!!!!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Wh-What's the matter, Director?

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Tazuna! As director of Tracen Academy, 
I love horsegirls with all my heart…

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Concern!! Many of them currently 
don't have a chance to fully shine! 
This situation greatly worries me!!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Which! Is! Why!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Proposal! I will organize an 
entirely new racing event!!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: What!? A… A new racing event…!?

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Affirmation!! A set of races in addition 
to the beloved Twinkle Series!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Including all distances, all courses! 
A racing event unlike any other!!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text: I will call it…

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text: The URA Finale!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: URA… Finale…!!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Prepare yourself, Tazuna! 
We're about to get very busy!!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text:
Haste!! We must schedule a press 
conference to let everybody know!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: Director…!

text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text: —— Understood. I'll make the arrangements!

…Thus, a new racing event, 
the URA Finale, was born.

This event, created as a stage on which 
all horsegirls could shine…

…Would also be the trigger to your 
very own story with your trainee!

…Would also be the trigger to your 
very own story with your trainee!
